heroSection.title: Find your ideal property
heroSection.desc: With LAMAISON, explore thousands of listings in one click

apropos.title: About LAMAISON
apropos.body1: is a modern platform that connects
apropos.body4: We simplify property searching, selling, and renting through a fast, secure, and user-friendly interface.
apropos.body5: Our goal is to fully digitalize the real estate journey from browsing, listings to booking appointments, handling payments, and signing contracts.
apropos.body6: Whether you're a private seller looking to market your property or a real estate agency aiming to showcase your listings efficiently,

contact.expN: Tell us how we can help...

footer.prosAgen: Real estate platform connecting private individuals and professionals.

CGU.title: Terms of Use
CGU.intro: Welcome to LAMAISON. By using this site, you agree to these terms of use.
CGU.body2: LAMAISON is a platform that connects individuals and professionals in the real estate sector.
CGU.body4: Any abusive or fraudulent use of the site may lead to account suspension.
CGU.body6: All content available on the site is the property of LAMAISON and may not be reproduced without prior authorization.

confidentialite.title: Privacy Policy
confidentialite.intro: LAMAISON respects your privacy. No personal data will be sold to third parties.
confidentialite.body2: The information collected is used solely for managing your account and listings.
confidentialite.body4: The site uses cookies to enhance the user experience.
confidentialite.body6: You may request to view, modify, or delete your data at any time.
